metadata.title: AKS Tomcat & WildFly Runtime Abuse
metadata.description: Detects suspicious runtime activities in Java application servers (Tomcat, WildFly, WebLogic) such as hot deployment of WAR files, undeployment, and access to management interfaces.

properties.description: Detects suspicious runtime activities in Java application servers (Tomcat, WildFly, WebLogic) such as hot deployment of WAR files, undeployment, and access to management interfaces.
properties.query:
let AppServerPatterns = dynamic([
    "org.apache.catalina.startup.HostConfig.deployWAR",
    "org.apache.catalina.manager.ManagerServlet",
    "WFLYSRV0010: Deployed",
    "WFLYCTL0013: Operation",
    "weblogic.deploy",
    "Deploying web application archive",
    "undeploy"
]);
ContainerLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where LogEntry has_any (AppServerPatterns)
| extend
    ContainerId = ContainerID,
    LogMessage = LogEntry,
    PodName = extract("pod=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource))),
    Namespace = extract("namespace=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource)))
| join kind=leftouter (
    KubePodInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
    | distinct ContainerID, PodName = Name, Namespace, ClusterName, ContainerName
) on $left.ContainerId == $right.ContainerID
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    PodName,
    ContainerName,
    ContainerId,
    LogMessage
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, PodName, ContainerName, LogMessage

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Suspicious application server activity (deployment/management) detected in container '{{ContainerName}}' in pod '{{PodName}}'. Log: {{LogMessage}}
